mapper.sql: SELECT t1.`ARCHIVESCENTERID`, t1.`ARCHIVESCENTERNAME`, t1.`BNUMBER`, t1.`CABINETNO`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`ENABLE`, t1.`LAYERNO`, t1.`MEMO`, t1.`ORMORGID` AS `ORGID`, t1.`ORMORGID`, t11.`ORGNAME` AS `ORMORGNAME`, t1.`ARCHIVESCENTERNAME`||' '||t1.`CABINETNO`||' ' ||(case when t1.`LAYERNO` = '10' then '上层' when t1.`LAYERNO` = '20' then '中层' when t1.`LAYERNO` = '30' then '下层' else ' ' end ) ||t1.`LAYERNO` AS `POSITION`, t1.`SERIALNO`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN` FROM `T_ARCHIVESCENTER` t1 LEFT JOIN T_ORG t11 ON t1.ORMORGID = t11.ORGID WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1

SELECT t1.ARCHIVESCENTERID, t1.ARCHIVESCENTERNAME, t1.BNUMBER, t1.CABINETNO, t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.ENABLE, t1.LAYERNO, t1.MEMO, t1.ORMORGID AS ORGID, t1.ORMORGID, t11.ORGNAME AS ORMORGNAME, t1.ARCHIVESCENTERNAME||' '||t1.CABINETNO||' ' ||(case when t1.LAYERNO = '10' then '上层' when t1.LAYERNO = '20' then '中层' when t1.LAYERNO = '30' then '下层' else ' ' end ) ||t1.LAYERNO AS POSITION, t1.SERIALNO, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN FROM T_ARCHIVESCENTER t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t11 ON t1.ORMORGID = t11.ORGID WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1
